SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game

Class ResourceHolder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.ResourceHolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ResourceHolder extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the resources that a player can have in his possession. Additionally, it is used to represent the resources that a card side provides, or the resources required for a side to be placed on the game field.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourceHolder

      public ResourceHolder()
      Default constructor, initializes an empty resource holder.

    • ResourceHolder

      public ResourceHolder(SideFieldRepresentation fieldRepresentation)
      Constructor that initializes a resource holder with the resources provided by a card side.
      Parameters:
      fieldRepresentation - the card side representation.

    • ResourceHolder

      public ResourceHolder(SideFieldRepresentation fieldRepresentation, List<Symbol> additionalSymbols)
      Constructor that initializes a resource holder with the resources provided by a card side and additional resources.
      Parameters:
      fieldRepresentation - the card side representation.
      additionalSymbols - the additional resources that a side might have, such as the center symbols.

    • ResourceHolder

      public ResourceHolder(ResourceHolder resourceHolder)
      Constructor that initializes a resource holder with the resources provided by another resource holder. The new resource holder is a copy of the provided one.
      Parameters:
      resourceHolder - the resource holder to copy.

  • Method Details

    • incrementResource

      public void incrementResource(Symbol symbol)
      Increments the count of a resource in the resource holder. If the provided symbol is not a resource, the method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the resource to increment.

    • decrementResource

      public void decrementResource(Symbol symbol)
      Decrements the count of a resource in the resource holder. If the provided symbol is not a resource, the method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the resource to decrement.

    • subtract

      public void subtract(ResourceHolder other) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Subtracts the resources of another resource holder from this resource holder.
      Parameters:
      other - the resource holder to subtract.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the resource holder does not contain enough resources to subtract.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(ResourceHolder other)
      Checks if the resource holder has at least the resources of another resource holder. To put it in other words, subtracting the other holder would result in non-negative amounts.
      Parameters:
      other - the resource holder to check.
      Returns:
      true if the resource holder contains the resources of the other resource holder, false otherwise.

    • add

      public void add(ResourceHolder other)
      Adds the resources of another resource holder to this resource holder.
      Parameters:
      other - the resource holder to add.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Checks if two resource holders hold the same amount of resources.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare
      Returns:
      true if the resource holders hold the same amount of resources, false otherwise.

    • countOf

      public int countOf(Symbol symbol)
      Returns the count of a resource in the resource holder.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the resource to count.
      Returns:
      the count of the resource.

    • getResources

      public Map<Symbol,Integer> getResources()
      Returns the resources of the resource holder. The returned map is a copy of the internal map. Modifying the returned map does not affect the resource holder. To modify the resource holder, use the provided methods.
      Returns:
      the resources of the resource holder.
